pages.title: About
intro:
Hi! I'm Bren, and I'm a Senior Front End Developer who is passionate about building robust, accessible software while empowering my teams to become strongly capable, compassionate developers.

I'm a software engineer. I'm a father. I'm a musician. I'm a photographer.

sections.title: What do I care about?
sections.content: Intro content for what I care about

cards.title: People.
cards.content: As a developer, people are the heart of everything I do. I don't build software for the sake of building software. I build software to help people. All people. It's my duty as a developer to make sure that my deliverables are accessible to everyone through empathy and a deep understanding of WCAG standards. It's also my duty to build and enable capable, diverse and inclusive teams that can deliver robust, thoughtfully designed and rigoursouly tested projects.

sections.title: What are my core skills?
sections.intro:
First and foremost, I am a skilled front-end practioner with over 15 years experience working in web development, and over 25 years working in IT. Among my skills I pride myself on:

  • Front-end development
  • Testing
  • Accessibility
  • Mentoring and leading teams of developers
